rule-21-3-a.test_description: The baseline building's purchased hot water system's sizing is based on coincident loads

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building is modeled with a hot water or chilled water plant the plant shall be sized based on coincident loads.

rule-21-3-b.test_description: The baseline building's purchased hot water system's sizing is not based on coincident loads

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building is modeled with a hot water or chilled water plant the plant shall be sized based on coincident loads.

rule-21-4-a.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with a HW Loop with a natural draft boiler

standard.rule_description: When baseline building does not use purchased heat, baseline systems 1,5,7,11,12 shall be modeled with natural draft boilers.

rule-21-4-b.test_description: Baseline building is system type 7  and is incorrectly modeled with a HW Loop with a forced draft boiler

standard.rule_description: When baseline building does not use purchased heat, baseline systems 1,5,7,11,12 shall be modeled with natural draft boilers.

rule-21-5-a.test_description: Baseline building is 12,000 ft2, has baseline system type 7 and is correctly modeled with a HW Loop with a single boiler.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), for building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler shall be modeled.

rule-21-5-b.test_description: Baseline building is 12,000 ft2, has baseline system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with a HW Loop with two boilers.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), for building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler shall be modeled.

rule-21-5-c.test_description: Baseline building is 24,000 ft2, has baseline system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with a HW Loop with one boiler.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), for building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler shall be modeled.

rule-21-5-d.test_description: Baseline building is 24,000 ft2, has baseline system type 7 and is correctly modeled with a HW Loop with two equally sized boiler(s).

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), for building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler shall be modeled.

rule-21-5-e.test_description: Baseline building is 24,000 ft2, has baseline system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with a HW Loop with two unequally sized boiler(s).

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), for building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler shall be modeled.

rule-21-6-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with two boilers staged based on load. Boiler 1 is staged before Boiler 2.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), and is modeled with two boilers, each boiler shall be staged based on load.

rule-21-6-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with two boilers staged based on load. Boiler 2 is staged before Boiler 1.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), and is modeled with two boilers, each boiler shall be staged based on load.

rule-21-6-c.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with two boilers is not staged based on load.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), and is modeled with two boilers, each boiler shall be staged based on load.

rule-21-7-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with supply and return temperatures correctly set to 180 F and 130 F respectively

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), the hot water supply temperature (HWST) shall be 180F, and the hot water return temperature (HSRT) shall be 130F

rule-21-7-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with supply and return temperatures incorrectly set to 200 F and 150 F respectively

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), the hot water supply temperature (HWST) shall be 180F, and the hot water return temperature (HSRT) shall be 130F

rule-21-9-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with total pump power per flow rate correctly set to 19 W/gpm

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building is modeled with a hot water plant, served by boiler(s), (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), the hot water pump power shall be 19W/gpm

rule-21-9-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with total pump power per flow rate incorrectly set to 21 W/gpm

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building is modeled with a hot water plant, served by boiler(s), (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), the hot water pump power shall be 19W/gpm

rule-21-10-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has HHW plant with the hot water pump that serves a total of 100,000 ft2 floor area. The pump's speed control value is correctly set to FIXED_SPEED

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building uses boiler)s) or purchased hot water, the hot water pump shall be modeled as riding the pump curve if the hot water system serves less than 120,000 ft^2 otherwise it shall be modeled with a VFD.

rule-21-10-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has HHW plant with the hot water pump that serves a total of 100,000 ft2 floor area. The pump's speed control value is incorrectly set to VARIABLE_SPEED

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building uses boiler)s) or purchased hot water, the hot water pump shall be modeled as riding the pump curve if the hot water system serves less than 120,000 ft^2 otherwise it shall be modeled with a VFD.

rule-21-10-c.test_description: Baseline RMR has HHW plant with the hot water pump that serves a total of 130,000 ft2 floor area. The pump's speed control value is correctly set to VARIABLE_SPEED

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building uses boiler)s) or purchased hot water, the hot water pump shall be modeled as riding the pump curve if the hot water system serves less than 120,000 ft^2 otherwise it shall be modeled with a VFD.

rule-21-10-d.test_description: Baseline RMR has HHW plant with the hot water pump that serves a total of 130,000 ft2 floor area. The pump's speed control value is incorrectly set to FIXED_SPEED

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building uses boiler)s) or purchased hot water, the hot water pump shall be modeled as riding the pump curve if the hot water system serves less than 120,000 ft^2 otherwise it shall be modeled with a VFD.

rule-21-11-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with child loop value correctly set to null

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building users boiler(s) or purchased hot water, the HW loop shall be modeled as primary only

rule-21-11-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has utilizes system 7 with child loop incorrectly referencing to  FluidLoop 2

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building users boiler(s) or purchased hot water, the HW loop shall be modeled as primary only

rule-21-12-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has system 7 with heating design and control's minimum flow fraction correctly set to 0.25

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building uses boiler(s) or purchased hot water, the HW Loop is modeled with continuous variable flow

rule-21-12-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has system 7 with heating design and control's minimum flow fraction incorrectly set to 0.30

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building uses boiler(s) or purchased hot water, the HW Loop is modeled with continuous variable flow
